english.segment1: Say goodbye. It's no life. We never realized. Where we've been. Sad ends. We never realized
english.segment2: Card games and old friends. Always no sad ends. Card games and old friends. You mess it up
english.segment3: No surprise. Different lives. Express the world on time. Sad ends. To bad ends. We never realized
english.segment4: Card games and old friends. Always no sad ends. Card games and old friends. You mess it up
